tables.description: Tags extracted from Adobe Font Metrics files (AFM, ACFM and AMFM).
This table contains a collection of tags found in font files of various formats.
The following tags are extracted from the TrueType font "name" table found in OTF, TTF, TTC and DFONT files.
Tags extracted from the PFM file header.
Tags extracted from PostScript font files (PFA and PFB).
